column3: A problem has been detected in order to get offers using GetOfferPackageSubmissionResult from API from S32. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
A problem has been detected in order to update offers using SubmitOfferPackage from API from S32. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
An error message appears during the connection to our API portail : 'User with specified identity already exists'. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
It is not possible to create products form Octopia using our API yet. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
It is not possible to get products from Octopia and Casino using our API yet. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
